channel.title: Php Mail-function error
channel.description:
Warning: mail() [function.mail]: Failed to connect to mailserver at "localhost" port 25, verify your "SMTP" and "smtp_port" setting in php.ini or use ini_set() in C:\wamp\www\send.php on line 8
i followed the tut at http://www.w3schools.com/PHP/php_ref_mail.asp, but still didn't work. Any solutions?

item.title: Php Mail-function error
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

Warning: mail() [function.mail]: Failed to connect to mailserver at “localhost” port 25, verify your “SMTP” and “smtp_port” setting in php.ini or use ini_set() in C:\wamp\www\send.php on line 8

i followed the tut at http://www.w3schools.com/PHP/php_ref_mail.asp, but still didn’t work. Any solutions?
